title: Platform focus
subtitle: Deploys • Observability • APIs
summary: Make changes safe and the system understandable.

steps.label: Context
steps.body: Incidents took too long; alerts were noisy; teams lacked a common view across services.

steps.label: Goals
steps.body: Make issues visible fast, cut alert noise, and agree on what 'good' looks like (SLOs).

steps.label: What I changed
steps.body: OpenTelemetry everywhere; Prometheus + Grafana; SLOs with clear runbooks; better release hygiene.

steps.label: Results
steps.body: p95 latency dropped; alert noise halved; MTTR improved while traffic grew.
